statements: DELETE FROM InvestmentRegulations WHERE name = 'Regulation XYZ';
DELETE FROM InvestmentRegulations WHERE id = 10 AND country = 'USA';
DELETE FROM InvestmentRegulations WHERE country = 'Canada' AND min_investment_amount >= 5000;

DELETE FROM compliance_requirements WHERE requirement_name = 'Data encryption' AND is_mandatory = true;

DELETE FROM Investment_Entities WHERE country = 'USA' AND registration_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM investment_products WHERE regulation_id = 2 AND risk_level = 'High';
